item.description: October is a month to be aware of who is in business in our area so we can create a better business community. Lets get organized and connect with people who we can grow with to be more successful recently. So our next meetup will be at the Hearth and Kettle at 7 PM Monday October 26, 2009. Let's get together and work on how we can help each other grow. {lease bring business cards and be prepared to talk about your businesses.
item.name: Lets connect for a better future
